answers.answer: Stress can make it worse. I wouldn't worry about delivering early until later. Try to keep your BP  in check now with diet, exercise and maybe meditation or yoga. They will monitor it. If you are bale to keep it in check, you won't have to be delivered early.

question: Hello everyone, this is my first pregnancy. I am 14 weeks + 4. I have had elevated blood pressure for the last few years. The OB said that it might lead to preeclampsia. And put at a high risk pregnancy. Has anyone had to deal with this? He also mentioned delivering early to try and avoid it. Saying around 37 weeks. I am just worried and have been trying to not stress out about it.
title: High blood pressure?
